statements: UPDATE blockchain_security_logging SET activity_description = 'Logged in successfully' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_security_logging SET user_id = 3, activity_description = 'Failed login attempt' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE blockchain_security_logging SET activity_description = 'User login attempt failed' WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE blockchain_security_logging SET activity_time = '2022-02-15 10:30:00', user_id = 103 WHERE id = 15;
UPDATE blockchain_logs SET action='Deploy Contract', details='Deployed a new smart contract' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE security_events SET description='Unauthorized Access Detected', event_type='Security Breach' WHERE event_id=2;
UPDATE blockchain_logs SET action = 'Transaction', details = 'Updated transaction details' WHERE log_id = 1001
UPDATE security_events SET description = 'User login successful' WHERE event_type = 'Login'
UPDATE blockchain_logs SET activity='Verified' WHERE log_id=10;
UPDATE security_logs SET event='Login Successful' WHERE user_id=100;
UPDATE blockchain_logs SET activity = 'Transaction Processed' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE security_logs SET event = 'Unauthorized Access Attempt' WHERE log_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET sender_id = 100, amount = 500.00 WHERE receiver_id = 200;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', public_key = 'newpublickey' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_logs SET log_message = 'Updated log message.' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500.00, timestamp = '2022-06-30 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET block_size = 1024 WHERE block_id = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 500.75, sender = 'Alice' WHERE transaction_id = 2005;
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET block_size = 500, miner_id = 1 WHERE block_id = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1500.75, sender = 'Alice' WHERE transaction_id = 2001;
